Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Appearance of Wealth]{Appearance of Wealth}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Precious Metals]{Precious Metals}

You hold power over wealth, trade, and treasure.
name: Wealth Domain
